item.description:
Hi Incubators!

I hope the week finds you well and smiling. As the weather looks like rain, we'll be checking back into the Democracy Center for this week's incubator.

So come on out and pass the word along to your friends too. We'll be breaking out the sunshine and the laughter indoors.

Remember no previous improv experience required.

And also, check out this list of improv games. http://improvencyclop... and if you'd like bring an idea of one of the games you'd like to play.

$3 suggested donation to pay for space rental and meetup.com upkeep.

Any questions or concerns, drop me a line!

Peace and prosperity,

Jason
item.name: Coming soon! Improvnormal Activity 2!!! - this week's improv incubator!
